issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
*Reproduction steps:*

1) run attached application
2) see console log

*Expected result:* "hello world" in the console.

*Actual result:* error message in the console. The exception information indicates that there is no access to the Titanium namespace in the script embedded into the local HTML file being displayed in the web view.

Below is the actual printout:

{code}[INFO] Appcelerator Titanium 3.2.0 Mobile Web index.html:2659
undefined Titanium is not defined local_webview.html:15
undefined Ti is not defined local_webview.html:20
[INFO] Loaded index.html:2659{code}
fields.summary: MobileWeb: scripts executed in WebView do not have access to Titanium namespace
